text: Camila Mendes has split with boyfriend Victor Houston. The Riverdale star, 24, ended her brief romance with her hometown boyfriend'very recently'according to E!.'Camila ended things with Victor after ComicCon, when she realized she wasn't ready to be in this relationship anymore,'the source said. The end : Camila Mendes, 24, has split with boyfriend Victor Houston ; ( pictured August )'Victor was completely blindsided and is very heartbroken,'the insider added.'He has been receiving a lot of backlash from the Riverdale community, even though it was actually Camila's choice to end the relationship.'The couple - childhood friends from Florida - started the romance rumors back in June as they posted messages to each other's social media accounts.
